errors.camera_browser_support: Connection to your device's camera is not supported on this browser.
errors.camera_permissions: Permission to connect to your camera was rejected, adjust your browser preferences and try again.
errors.onchain_unsupported: Onchain payments are not yet supported
errors.permissions_clipboard: The request to read your clipboard was rejected. Please adjust your browser preferences if you would like to enable clipboard read access.
errors.permissions_notifications: The request to enable browser notifications was rejected. Please adjust your browser preferences if you would like them enabled.
errors.201: Already paid with this hash using a different amount or destination.
errors.203: There was a permanent failure at the destination.
errors.207: Invoice has expired before payment could be completed.
errors.900: An invoice with the given label already exists
errors.901: An invoice with the given preimage already exists
errors.902: None of the specified private channels were usable
errors.19537: Provided rune does not have valid permissions for this request.
errors.min_sendable: Amount is less than payment request minimum
errors.max_sendable: Amount is larger than payment request maximum
errors.min_withdrawable: Amount is less than withdraw minimum
errors.max_withdrawable: Amount is larger than withdraw maximum
errors.get_info: Error trying to get node info
errors.storage_access: Access to local storage denied, so data cannot be deleted
errors.listen_invoice: Error trying to listen for invoice payments
errors.lnurl_metadata_hash: Description hash in payment request does not match the hash of LNURL metadata.
errors.lnurl_pay_amount: Amount in payment request does not match the amount requested.
errors.lnurl_unsupported_tag: This LNURL type: {{tag}} is currently unsupported.
errors.recurrence_unsupported: Recurring Bolt12 offers are not currently supported.

subheadings.amount: How much would you like to {{direction; receive:receive; send:send;}}?
subheadings.note: Add a note for the receiver of this payment.
subheadings.destination: Where would you like to send a payment?
subheadings.connect: Enter your node connection details so that an encrypted connection to your node can be established over the Lightning network.
subheadings.rune: Add a rune to give Clams permissions to interact with your node. Restrict the rune to the following session public key:
subheadings.welcome: Control your CoreLN node securely and directly over the Lightning network.
subheadings.decrypt: Enter your 4 digit pin number to decrypt your local data.
